cobblemon_shuffled.ability.alienate.desc: Normal-type moves become Dark-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little
cobblemon_shuffled.ability.bombilate.des: Normal-type moves become Bug-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little

cobblemon_shuffled.ability.excavate.desc: Normal-type moves become Ground-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little
cobblemon_shuffled.ability.immolate.desc: Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little
cobblemon_shuffled.ability.lapidate.desc: Normal-type moves become Rock-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little
cobblemon_shuffled.ability.liquidate.des: Normal-type moves become Water-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little
cobblemon_shuffled.ability.photosynthate: Normal-type moves become Grass-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little
cobblemon_shuffled.ability.serrate.desc: Normal-type moves become Steel-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little
cobblemon_shuffled.ability.spectate.desc: Normal-type moves become Ghost-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little
cobblemon_shuffled.ability.subjugate.des: Normal-type moves become Dragon-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little
cobblemon_shuffled.ability.vindicate.des: Normal-type moves become Fighting-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little
